snippet: Under the agreement, Yulia V. Tymoshenko would be pardoned by her rival, President Viktor F. Yanukovich, in exchange for a commitment from her to leave the country.
abstract: European diplomats appear close to negotiating release of former Ukrainian Prime Min Yulia V Tymoshenko, whose imprisonment by government under her political rival Pres Viktor F Yanukovich has strained ties with the West and threatened to derail trade agreement with Europe; under agreement, Tymoshenko would be pardoned by Yanukovich in exchange for promise to leave country.
lead_paragraph: Under the agreement, Yulia V. Tymoshenko would be pardoned by her rival, President Viktor F. Yanukovich, in exchange for a commitment from her to leave the country.

headline.main: Envoys Near Deal to Free Ex-Premier of Ukraine
headline.print_headline: Envoys Near Deal to Free Ex-Premier Of Ukraine
